title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: The marking between button and list is too large. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top.
EB: The marking between button and list should be reduced. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog window.
SR: To reproduce the issue, try changing a parameter name to something very long. In the preview section, the text is cut off.
